  17. /* Runtime checks to try to catch errors in code generation.
  18.    See flambda_to_clambda.ml for more information. */

  20. #include <stdio.h>

  22. #include "caml/mlvalues.h"

  24. ‌value caml_check_value_is_closure(value v, value v_descr)
  25. {
  26.   const char* descr = String_val(v_descr);
  27.   value orig_v = v;

  29.   if (v == (value) 0) {
  30.     fprintf(stderr, "NULL is not a closure: %s\n",
  31.       descr);
  32.     abort();
  33.   }
  34.   if (!Is_block(v)) {
  35.     fprintf(stderr,
  36.       "Expecting a closure, got a non-boxed value %p: %s\n",
  37.       (void*) v, descr);
  38.     abort();
  39.   }
  40.   if (!(Tag_val(v) == Closure_tag || Tag_val(v) == Infix_tag)) {
  41.     fprintf(stderr,
  42.       "Expecting a closure, got a boxed value with tag %i: %s\n",
  43.       Tag_val(v), descr);
  44.     abort();
  45.   }
  46.   if (Tag_val(v) == Infix_tag) {
  47.     v -= Infix_offset_val(v);
  48.     CAMLassert(Tag_val(v) == Closure_tag);
  49.   }
  50.   CAMLassert(Wosize_val(v) >= 2);

  52.   return orig_v;
  53. }

  55. ‌value caml_check_field_access(value v, value pos, value v_descr)
  56. {
  57.   const char* descr = String_val(v_descr);
  58.   value orig_v = v;
  59.   if (v == (value) 0) {
  60.     fprintf(stderr,
  61.       "Access to field %" ARCH_INT64_PRINTF_FORMAT
  62.       "u of NULL: %s\n", (ARCH_UINT64_TYPE) Long_val(pos), descr);
  63.     abort();
  64.   }
  65.   if (!Is_block(v)) {
  66.     fprintf(stderr,
  67.       "Access to field %" ARCH_INT64_PRINTF_FORMAT
  68.       "u of non-boxed value %p is illegal: %s\n",
  69.       (ARCH_UINT64_TYPE) Long_val(pos), (void*) v, descr);
  70.     abort();
  71.   }
  72.   if (Tag_val(v) == Infix_tag) {
  73.     uintnat offset = Infix_offset_val(v);
  74.     v -= offset;
  75.     pos += offset / sizeof(value);
  76.   }
  77.   CAMLassert(Long_val(pos) >= 0);
  78.   if (Long_val(pos) >= Wosize_val(v)) {
  79.     fprintf(stderr,
  80.       "Access to field %" ARCH_INT64_PRINTF_FORMAT
  81.       "u of value %p of size %" ARCH_INT64_PRINTF_FORMAT "u is illegal: %s\n",
  82.       (ARCH_UINT64_TYPE) Long_val(pos), (void*) v,
  83.       (ARCH_UINT64_TYPE) Wosize_val(v),
  84.       descr);
  85.     abort();
  86.   }
  87.   return orig_v;
  88. }
